Rockville.Earle B. Wood Middle School:
Earle B. Wood Middle School is a public school for students in grades 6, 7, and 8, located in Rockville, Maryland.
Wood Middle School's students generally live in Rockville or Aspen Hill.
Students who graduate from Lucy V. Barnsley, Flower Valley, Maryvale, Meadow Hall, or Rock Creek Valley elementary schools may generally attend Wood Middle School.
